Description:
Detects the usage of emojis in the command line, this could be a sign of potential defense evasion activity.

Author: @Kostastsale, @TheDFIRReport
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Defense Evasion Activity Via Emoji Usage In CommandLine - 3
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%🦆%' or command like '%🦅%' or command like '%🦉%' or command like '%🦇%' or command like '%🐺%' or command like '%🐗%' or
